title: HELP
body: so yeah i wanted to start playing leagu of legends i downloaded setup installed league of legends when i wanted to start/lauch lol(for first time) i couln't it's just turns off what should i do ?

replies.body:
Most of the time when this occurs, it's the result of the client being blocked from accessing specific files or resources it relies on. To mitigate this, you can assign specific system permissions with [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if this helped.
